sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../css/propcard.css' import CarCard from '../../accountmenu/uikit/CarCard' import { useState } from 'react' import BigButton from '../../accountmenu/uikit/BigButton' import Button from '../../accountmenu/uikit/Button' import MdCard from 'react-ionicons/lib/MdCard' import MdCash from 'react-ionicons/lib/MdCash' import Alert from '../../alert/Alert' const PropertyHouse = (props) => { // const { address, setAlert, gprice, tax, balance, maxbalance, garageTypes, roommatefree, garageCount, roommatemax, roommates } = props const html = garageTypes.forEach((item) => `${item}
`) const [ taxValue, setTaxValue ] = useState('') return (
{address}
{`$ ${gprice.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".")}`}
{`Dabartiniai įsiskolinimai: `} {`$ ${balance.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".")}`} iš {` $ ${maxbalance.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".")}`} {` [$ ${tax.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".")} per dieną ]`}
{`Mokėkite`}
} type={0} onPress={() => console.log('Sėkmingai sumokėta grynaisiais pinigais ' + taxValue)} />
} type={0} onPress={() => console.log('Sėkmingai sumokėjo banko kortele mokestį, kurio suma ' + taxValue)} />
{`Garažas: `} {garageCount === 0 ? (`Nėra`) : ( garageTypes.map((item, index) => index === garageTypes.length-1 ? `${item}` : `${item} | `) )} {`Yra tuščių vietų: `} {`${roommatefree} / ${roommatemax}`}
{roommates.map((item, index) => { return (
  • {`${index+1}. ${item.name}`}
    • ) })}
    setAlert(true, { type: 1, title: 'Pardavimas agentūrai', text: `Ar tikrai norite parduoti?`, value: [{text: 'Atsisakyti', type: 0}, {text: 'Parduoti', type: 1}] })} />
    setAlert(true, { type: 0, title: 'Pardavimas žaidėjui', text: `Ar tikrai norite parduoti transporto priemonę ${address}?`, value: [{text: 'Atsisakyti', type: 0}, {text: 'Parduoti', type: 1}] })} />
    ) } export default PropertyHouse
